entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow ending late this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy late this evening then snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 05 February 2023
